invocations.description: Returns true if the action script is executed at the location where the action waypoint was set and false otherwise. If the optional parameter range is specified, return true/false if you are standing within range tiles of the waypoint location in x or y.
invocations.ex:
if not islocation(3) then
	gotolabel($wptid-1)
end
invocations.exDescription: If used as a cavebot action, it will go to the previous waypoint if you're not in 3 sqms close to the action's location.
